casebody.data:
Leticia R. CASTRO; and Grupomex Holdings, LLC, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable James Crockett, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Geraldine Kirk-Hughes, Esq.; and John Salov, Real Parties in Interest. No. 73951 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED FEBRUARY 15, 2018

DENIED.
